pr_title: Add support for valuetype configure flag

timeline.message:
Add support for valuetype configure flag

Signed-off-by: Tobi Ajila <atobia@ca.ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText: Please move this into its place in alphabetical order above.
timeline.author: keithc-ca
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -277,8 +277,7 @@ extern "C" {
 #cmakedefine J9VM_THR_LOCK_RESERVATION
 #cmakedefine J9VM_THR_PREEMPTIVE
 #cmakedefine J9VM_THR_SMART_DEFLATION
-
-#undef J9VM_OPT_VALHALLA_VALUE_TYPES
+#cmakedefine J9VM_OPT_VALHALLA_VALUE_TYPES

timeline.bodyText: J9VM_OPT_VALHALLA_MVT doesn't appear to be used anywhere; while you're here, perhaps you should remove this definition and the option in runtime/cmake/options.cmake.
